edu.illinois.geoalarm

Class TripPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • edu.illinois.geoalarm.TripPlanner

  • public class TripPlanner
extends Activity
    The TripPlanner activity handles planning a bus trip. This class uses the data input by the user to display possible itineraries, and then passes the trip data to the RouteMap class so it can start the trip
    Author:
    GeoAlarm
